channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le télescope Nancy Grace Roman percera-t-il l'énigme de l'énergie noire en étudiant les vides cosmiques ?
item.description: L'expansion de l'Univers semble s'accélérer sous l'effet paradoxalement répulsif de la gravitation en présence de la mystérieuse énergie noire. Mais sa nature sera peut-être révélée en étudiant les étranges vides cosmiques entre les filaments formés d'amas de galaxies.

item.title: La bonne affaire du jour, c’est ce TV 4K QLED gigantesque de 98″ et 144 Hz avec 480 € de remise
item.description: Même si ce n'est pas à la portée de tous, il est possible d'avoir un TV géant d'une diagonale de 98 pouces pour un prix raisonnable, comme ce TCL 98P8K qui passe de 1 999 euros à 1 521 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: A Revamped iMac Pro Could Be Big, Expensive, and Exactly What I Need
item.description: A giant iMac would also cost a fortune.

item.title: OpenAI reveals major hire to lead global Stargate data center expansion
item.description: OpenAI's Stargate expansion to boost government adoption of AI is being led by former UK Chancellor George Osborne.

item.title: Walmart just dropped a gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 Ti for $1,299 – the lowest price I've seen yet
item.description: Get an MSI gaming laptop with a high-end RTX 5070 Ti graphics card for just $1,299 with this last-minute deal at Walmart.

item.title: Grab the Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones for a record-low price — and get some five-star earbuds for free
item.description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones are some of the best cans around, and right now, you can get them for a record-low price – and get some excellent earbuds for free.

item.title: Samsung seems to be focusing on foldables in 2026 – here are 3 possible reasons why
item.description: With the Galaxy Z Trifold on the way and rumors of a small upgrade for the Galaxy S26 series, it seems that Samsung is betting big on its folding phones for next year.

item.title: Over 30% of all new music on Deezer is AI-generated – and most people can't tell the difference
item.description: 97% of people can't tell if music is AI-generated – and over 30% of all new tracks are.

item.title: The Weirdest Medical Cases of 2025
item.description: Lactating armpits, deadly burgers, and the world's nosiest parasite are some of this year's most bizzaro medical tales.

item.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
item.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.

item.title: The Directors of ‘Final Destination Bloodlines’ May Have Their Next Sci-Fi Epic
item.description: Zach Lipovsky and Adam Stein are attached to direct an adaptation of the sci-fi novel, 'The Traveler.'

item.title: How to Watch the Final Meteor Shower of 2025
item.description: Conditions in the US should be perfect for the final meteor shower of 2025, with no moonlight present to interfere with spotting shooting stars.

item.title: People Are Paying to Get Their Chatbots High on ‘Drugs’
item.description: An online marketplace is selling code modules that simulate the effects of cannabis, ketamine, cocaine, ayahuasca, and alcohol when they are uploaded to ChatGPT.

item.title: What is the release date for Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 on Starz?
item.description: Strap in, because we're about to witness the most spectacular cliffhanger, but when is Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 on Starz?

item.title: Dans un monde où le prix des SSD ne cesse d’augmenter, le Samsung 990 Pro 2 To perd 85 € chez Amazon
item.description: Entre sa capacité de 2 To et son dissipateur thermique pour empêcher la surchauffe, ce Samsung SSD 990 Pro possède bien des qualités. Retrouvez-le pour 189,99 euros au lieu de 274,99 euros. Une belle affaire à une époque où le prix des SSD ne cesse d'augmenter.

item.title: You can get almost half price off Xbox Wireless Controllers right now if you're looking for a last-minute gaming gift
item.description: Loads of Xbox Wireless Controllers have just dropped to lowest-ever prices ahead of the Holidays.

item.title: Tesla misled customers about self-driving features, judge rules
item.description: Tesla could be temporarily locked out of its biggest US market if it doesn't change deceptive marketing that exaggerates the self-driving capabilities of its cars, the California Department of Motor Vehicles warned on Tuesday, adopting the ruling of an administrative law judge. The DMV said Tesla's use of terms like "Autopilot" and "Full Self-Driving" to […]...

item.title: Nouveau succès pour Ariane 6 : pourquoi ce lancement est une bonne nouvelle pour votre GPS
item.description: Ce mercredi matin, Ariane 6 a placé deux satellites Galileo en orbite. Ce cinquième succès confirme que le lanceur est fiable et marque la fin de la dépendance européenne envers les prestataires étrangers.

item.title: 5 weird and affordable cameras that make perfect Christmas gifts — recommended by a photography expert
item.description: These five budget-friendly cameras are the perfect size for stocking stuffers on Christmas day and will be a hit with that camera lover in your life

item.title: Apple Engineers Are Inspecting Bacon Packaging to Help Level Up US Manufacturers
item.description: Initial participants in the new Apple Manufacturing Academy tell WIRED that the tech giant’s surprising frankness and hands-on support are already benefiting their bottom lines.

item.title: Every AI founder thinks they want a mega investing round. Trust me, you don’t
item.description: Big rounds push you toward optics instead of output. You start building for the board instead of the customer. There is a strange gravitational pull in the AI ecosystem right now. Every founder wants to raise a monster round. A $50 million seed. A $200 million Series A. The kind of fundraise that makes headlines, melts your inbox, and gets your parents to finally understand you have a real job....

item.title: AI is starting to shop for you. Here’s how Visa is making sure it doesn’t scam you
item.description: As AI agents book trips and buy products on your behalf, Visa and Akamai say trust and identity are the missing pieces. As autonomous AI agents increasingly browse, compare prices, and complete purchases on behalf of consumers, one challenge is becoming unavoidable for merchants: trust.

item.title: Copilot sur Windows 11 : vous aurez désormais le dernier mot avant l’accès à vos dossiers
item.description: Microsoft joue la carte de l'apaisement en informant ses usagers que ses agents IA auront besoin du consentement des utilisateurs avant d'accéder à des informations personnelles.

item.title: JBL Tune Buds are still at their lowest-ever price at Amazon — save $60 before Christmas
item.description: As of Dec. 17, the JBL Tune Buds are still at their lowest-ever price of $39.95 at Amazon. This is 60% off their list price of $99.95.

item.title: C’est Noël dans une semaine ! Voici les meilleures offres pour avoir ses cadeaux à temps
item.description: Si vous n'avez pas encore fini vos achats de fin d'année, pas d'inquiétudes. Il reste encore une semaine et beaucoup d'enseignes comme Amazon, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount et Fnac-Darty, continuent de faire des offres avec une livraison garantie avant le 25 décembre. Voici les promotions en temps réel qui peuvent sauver votre Noël.

item.title: The Sony XM5 headphones now come with free earbuds at Amazon
item.description: Find the best free earbuds deal at Amazon. Save 52% on the Sony WH-1000XM5 bundle at Amazon.

item.title: Ben & Jerrys is launching Ice Cream Bars — get free Cookie Dough bars on Dec. 17
item.description: Ben & Jerry's is launching Ice Cream Bars. More than 150 Scoop Shops are handing out free Cookie Dough bars on Dec. 17.

item.title: PC Gamer : voici les configurations officielles conseillées par Microsoft (et nos grosses réserves)
item.description: Microsoft nous livre ses propres recommandations pour vérifier si votre configuration PC peut faire tourner les jeux du moment. Des conseils plutôt pertinents, sur lesquels nous émettons parfois quelques réserves.

item.title: Former Neuralink Exec Launches Organ Preservation Effort
item.description: Science Corporation, founded by Neuralink’s first president, Max Hodak, has unveiled a prototype machine to extend the life of organs for longer periods.

item.title: How to watch Newcastle United vs. Fulham online for free
item.description: How to watch Carabao Cup for free. Live stream Newcastle United vs. Fulham in the EFL Cup for free.

item.title: Face ID invisible et optique variable, voic pourquoi l’iPhone 18 Pro s’annonce déjà comme une révolution
item.description: Selon de nouvelles informations partagées par The Information, les iPhone 18 Pro et iPhone 18 Pro Max abandonneraient l'emblématique Dynamic Island au profit d'une solution plus discrète.

item.title: Astronomers May Have Finally Solved the Mystery of These Freaky Blue Cosmic Flashes
item.description: Astronomers call them LFBOTs—rare and powerful bursts of blue light that shine across billions of light-years and then vanish in just a few days.

item.title: Bethesda Is Trying to Figure Out What ‘Fallout’ Games Season 3 Might Tie Into
item.description: Season two of the Prime Video adaptation might have only just kicked off, but Bethesda is already looking to the future—of both the show and the games.

item.title: DEI Died This Year. Maybe It Was Supposed To
item.description: I’m a Black staffer at WIRED. My position feels more precarious than ever. There’s a reason for that.

item.title: What every manager should know about the Queen Bee myth
item.description: It says very little about women, and a great deal about the cultures they are operating in. The idea of the “Queen Bee” has been buzzing around corporate life for decades. You’ve heard the story: A woman finally breaks into senior leadership, only to turn around and block other women from rising behind her. She is territorial, icy, maybe even hostile. She has clawed her way to the top, the logic goes, and she intends to stay there alone....

item.title: A faster-than-light spaceship would actually look a lot like Star Trek’s Enterprise
item.description: Physicists discovered that the famous ‘Star Trek’ spaceship got a lot right about designing a ship to jump from galaxy to galaxy. The USS Enterprise was an impossible dream rendered in fiber glass. Designed for Star Trek, it looked like a creation straight out of creator Gene Roddenberry’s imagination: Twin nacelles—those long, gleaming engine pods held by elegant pylons—extended from a central saucer holding the engines that allowed Captain Kirk, Mr. Spock, Dr. Bones, and the rest of the crew to travel across the cosmos....

item.title: How to network on vacation (and why)
item.description: The idea leaves any PTO-spending worker in their right mind aghast. But meeting new people on your travels could lead to something more. At one time or another, we’ve all sat next to someone interesting on a plane or a train, making small talk that sometimes leads to long-winded conversations about life, the world, even personal struggles or accomplishments. ...
